data.title: Emmys: The Complete List of Nominations
data.meta_description: Every category, every nomination -- let's do this
data.text:
Joshua Jackson and Melissa McCarthy only announced nominations for the major categories Thursday morning but the official Emmy website posted the full list of candidates for your consideration.

Here's the full, unedited list of nominees for the 2011 Primetime Emmy Awards. Enjoy!

Futurama • Maurice LaMarche as Lrrr & Orson Welles
